div.div:
Superintendent's Message
The Covington County School District has 10 campuses in our district: 3 elementary schools, 2 middle schools, 2 high schools, 1 attendance center, a career and technical center and an alternative school. Our schools are located in the Collins, Mount Olive, Hopewell and Seminary communities. Our staff is dedicated to providing excellent educational opportunities that foster learning from ...
